title: Queens Of The Stone Age & Josh Homme Discography
description:
Queens Of The Stone Age & Josh Homme Discography

This is a collection of Queens Of The Stone Age and everything that the great 
Josh Homme have put his fingers on! Homme played guitar in Kyuss. In the late 90&#039;s he started a project called The Dessert Sessions, where I gathered some fine ass musicians who played together on his farm anually. Some of them are: 
PJ Harvey, Jeordie White (Twiggy Ramirez), Dave Catching, Nick Oliveri, Mark Lanegan, John McBain, Josh Freese, Chris Goss, Alain Johannes, Dean Ween, Alfredo HernÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¡ndez, Fred Drake, Brant Bjork, Ben Shepherd, Pete Stahl, Jesse Hughes, Craig Armstrong, Mario Lalli, Larry Lalli, Teddy Quinn, Natasha Shneider, Joey Castillo, Brian O&#039;Connor & Troy Van Leeuwen. 

They released 10 vinyls under the Dessert Sessions name which also got released on CD two and two together. Homme is also the lead singer and guitarplayer in QOTSA and the drummer (guest?) in Eagles Of Death Metal


All the albums are ripped in 192 kbit CBR
